div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 248 Preveza?, Epirus, 1933-1934 (834) Burial: 175-150 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 600 AR Philip II: 1 post. tetrob. Boeotia: 1 hemidr. Histiaea: 75 tetrob. Corinth and colonies: 5 st.; c. 500 dr. ANS 1944.100.37090 ANS 1944.100.37096 Parium: 1 hemidr. Disposition: R. C. Lockett, part (some in SNG, but not identified as from the hd.); formerly J. P. Shear coll., part (stolen Dec. 1968); New York 3 dr. (also detailed list of Corinthian vari- eties with photos of 35 dr. and the Philip tetrob.) Robert, Ã‰tudes, p. 195
